content: Prof. Sheng Cao Sheng Cao Professor, Ph.D. Supervisor caosheng@uestc.edu.cn, 7332517@qq.com News feed 25/11/2025 - Our paper "GBShard: Adaptive Sharding for Blockchain Network via Granular-Ball Partitioning" was accepted by IEEE Transactions on Network Science and Engineering. Congrats to Zirui! 11/09/2025 - Our paper "A Unified Framework for Hybrid Network Intrusion Detection" was accepted by IEEE Transactions on Network and Service Management. Congrats to Yan Wang! 18/02/2025 - Our paper "Secure Data Delivery with Certificateless Homomorphic Network Coding Signature Scheme for Unmanned Aerial Vehicle Networks" was accepted by IEEE Internet of Things Journal. Congrats to Hao Huang! 21/08/2024 - Our paper "Adaptive Cost Weight-Enabled Federated Distillation for Network Intrusion Detection" was accepted by IEEE International Symposium on Parallel and Distributed Processing with Applications (ISPA 2024). Congrats to Zidong Chen, Yan Wang! 01/08/2024 - Our paper "A Two-Stage Class Incremental Learning Approach for Network Intrusion Detection" was accepted by IEEE Global Communications Conference (GLOBECOM 2024). Congrats to Yan! 01/08/2024 - Our paper "From Detection to Classification: A Coarse-to-Fine Framework for Network Intrusion Detection" was accepted by IEEE Global Communications Conference (GLOBECOM 2024). Congrats to Yan! 01/08/2024 - Our paper "Secure and Efficient Certificateless Homomorphic Signature Scheme for Network Coding" was accepted by IEEE Global Communications Conference (GLOBECOM 2024). 01/07/2024 - Our paper "Tightly Secure Linearly Homomorphic Signature Schemes for Subspace Under DL Assumption in AGM" was accepted by International Conference on Information and Communications Security (ICICS 2024). 13/03/2024 - Our paper "Internet of Vehicles data sharing scheme via blockchain sharding" was accepted by Journal of Computer Research and Development. Congrats to Xiao Chen, Muhong Huang,Yifan Tian and Yan Wang! 22/01/2024 - Our paper "A Sharding-Based Blockchain Model Based on Zero Trust for Industrial Internet" was accepted by China Communications. Congrats to Haoqu! 25/12/2023 - Our paper "Portfolio-Based Incentive Mechanism Design for Cross-Device Federated Learning" was accepted by IEEE Wireless Communications and Networking Conference (WCNC 2024). Congrats to Jiaxi! 27/10/2023 - Our paper "A Hash-Based Multidimensional Graph Neural Network Approach for Zero Trust Oriented Access Control Security" was accepted by IEEE ICPADS 2023. Congrats to Fengfan! 21/06/2023 - Qian's master's thesis "Research on Cross-Blockchain Anonymous Payment Based on Auction" was judged as the excellent master's thesis in 2023, Congrats to Qian! 01/03/2023 - Our paper "Heuristics to sift extraneous factors in Dixon resultants" was selected as a highly cited paper by ESI (Essential Science Indicators) database in March 2023. 10/20/2022 - Congrats to Qian for being awarded National Scholarship and The First Prize Scholarship in School of Computer Science and Engineering, Univerisity of Electronic Science and Technology of China. 07/26/2022 - Our paper "A Multi-factor Reverse Auction Routing Scheme for Cross-Blockchain Payment" was accepted by Journal of Computer Research and Development(China). Congrats to Qian! 07/17/2022 - Our paper "Multi-dimensional Data Quick Query for Blockchain-based Federated Learning" was accepted by The 17th International Conference on Wireless Algorithms, System, and Applications (WASA 2022). Congrats to Jiaxi! 04/25/2022 - Congrats to Qian for being awarded Academic Young Crops of UESTC! 01/31/2022 - Our paper "A Behavior-Aware Scheme for Personalized Credit Computing" was accepted by IEEE International Conference on Computer Supported Cooperative Work in Design (CSCWD 2022). Congrats to Sixuan! 01/31/2022 - Our paper "Get a sense of accomplishment in doing exercises: A reinforcement Learning Perspective" was accepted by IEEE International Conference on Computer Supported Cooperative Work in Design (CSCWD 2022). Congrats to Songdeng! 01/21/2022 - Our paper "Heuristics to sift extraneous factors in Dixon resultants" was accepted by Journal of Symbolic Computation. 01/20/2022 - Our paper "Defending Data Poisoning Attack via Trusted Platform Module and Blockchain Oracle" was accepted by IEEE International Conference on Communications (ICC 2022). Congrats to Mingyuan! 01/20/2022 - Our paper "Enabling Privacy-Preserving Off-chain Payment via Hybrid Multi-hop Mechanism" was accepted by IEEE International Conference on Communications (ICC 2022). Congrats to Qian! 12/20/2021 - Congrats to Sixuan for being awarded Outstanding Graduate by Sichuan Province and UESTC! 12/15/2021 - Our paper "Hybrid Smart Contracts for Privacy-Preserving-Aware Insurance Compensation" was accepted by IEEE Wireless Communications and Networking Conference (WCNC 2022). Congrats to Qian! 10/28/2021 - Congrats to Sixuan for being awarded National Scholarship and The First Prize Scholarship in School of Computer Science and Engineering, Univerisity of Electronic Science and Technology of China! 10/20/2021 - Our paper "Enabling Verifiable Privacy-Preserving Multi-Type Data Aggregation in Smart Grids" was accepted by IEEE Transactions on Dependable and Secure Computing. 09/26/2021 - Our paper "Enabling Auction-based Cross-Blockchain Protocol for Online Anonymous Payment" was accepted by the 27th IEEE International Conference on Parallel and Distributed Systems (ICPADS 2021). Congrats to Qian! 08/31/2021 - Our paper "Dynamic Incentive Mechanism Design for Regulation-Aware Systems" was accepted by International Journal of Intelligent Systems. Congrats to Sixuan! 08/02/2021 - Our patent "A Secure Auditing System, Method and Server for Database" was granted. 07/22/2021 - Our paper "Student Model and Clustering Research on Personalized E-learning" was published on Journal of Internet Technology. Congrats to Songdeng! 07/08/2021 - Our paper "Regulation-as-a-Service: Model Checking for Decision-Making Behaviors in Price-Sensitive Service Systems" was accepted by IEEE International Conference on Services Computing (SCC 2021).
